item.description:
Happy Holidays!

Please join us for a Social Media Holiday Party at Think Tank Bistro in Kendall Square, Cambridge on Tuesday, December 13 from 6:00 PM to 9:00 PM. This will be a joint meetup for multiple groups. Social Media Producer Kristen Haley of BeantownSocial.com has organized this event for our group.

Like Boston Happy Hour, BeantownSocial is all about being social in Boston. They aggregate and host events that bring together people interested in semi-professional and fun networking. You can find them on Meetup, Facebook, A Small World, Twitter, Plancast, Boston.com and more. For more information contact Kristen@beantownsocial.com.

Let's join them for yet another reason to celebrate Christmas/Hanukkah/Festivas/Holiday Season with new and old friends and nosh on some complimentary appetizers provided by the amazing Think Tank Bistro in Cambridge.

Come party with BeantownSocial, The Red Sox Natives, Boston Happy Hour, Social Fun and other groups. The event is on facebook and eventbrite.

We will have a Breakaway at 7:30 P.M. so we may facilitate a kickass social networking session. Please be prepared to share with us a fun social event in the upcoming month!

There is no cover.

Please RSVP here if you would like to attend.

Everyone is responsible for their own drinks. Please maintain your own bar tab or pay as you order and tip your servers.

See you at Think Tank Bistro.

Frank
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess for the Reserved Section for BeantownSocial.com - Kristen Haley - Social Media Producer
item.name: Social Media Holiday Joint Meetup at Think Tank in Kendall Square, Cambridge
